metadata.title: CVE-2016-5348 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The GPS component in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.xbefore 5.1.1, 6.x before 2016-10-01, and 7.0 before 2016-10-01 allowsman-in-the-middle attackers to cause a denial of service (memoryconsumption, and device hang or reboot) via a large xtra.bin or xtra2.binfile on a spoofed Qualcomm gpsonextra.net or izatcloud.net host, akainternal bug 29555864.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
